findings.rationale: No indemnification obligations may expose a party to unforeseen liabilities or losses without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to total fees paid can leave a party vulnerable to significant losses exceeding fee amounts.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights can prevent monitoring compliance with the NDA, increasing risk of misuse of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: An 18% interest rate on late payments may discourage timely payment and lead to financial strain.
findings.evidence_quote: Late payments shall accrue interest at a rate of 18% per annum.

findings.rationale: Absence of IP provisions could lead to disputes over ownership of developed ideas or materials.
